::KitKat::

Her body shook as she came back on line.  She slowly opened her eyes 
and looked up.  As her vision came into focus, she saw Drillbit 
standing over her.  She felt light headed and a little dizzy.
She nodded to him.

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit finished. He replaced the brain plate. she would now not
> remember anything about Land Mine and TimeBomb, but she would 
remember
> everything els. More importantly, she would remember him. He 
switched
> her back online.
> "KitKat? Honey, can you hear me?"
